text: Saatchi (Tamil: சாட்சி; English: Witness) is a 1983 Tamil action drama film, directed by S. A. Chandrasekhar and produced by P. S. V. Hariharan. The film stars Vijayakanth, Viji, M. N. Nambiar and Pandaribai in lead roles. The film had musical score by Shankar Ganesh. The film is a remake of 1981 Malayalam movie Raktham. ==Cast== *Vijayakanth *Viji *M. N. Nambiar *Pandari Bai *Senthil *Venniradai Moorthy == Soundtrack == Aagayam poo pookkum neram S.N.Surendar and P.Susheela ==References== ==External links== * Category:1983 films Category:Indian films Category:1980s Tamil-language films Category:Films scored by Sankar Ganesh Category:Indian action films Category:Indian films about revenge Category:Tamil remakes of Malayalam films Category:Films directed by S. A. Chandrasekhar Category:1983 action films
title: Saatchi (film)
